product.title: KIPOZI 1.25" Thermal Brush, Curling Iron Brush, Thermal Round Brush, LCD Display with 16 Adjustable Temperature, Auto Shut-Off, Black
product.description: We are committed to create some perfect and practical hair tools to our lovely beauties,leading you to a comfortable natural quality life. You will truly love yourself and be confidently beautiful! The thermal curling brush use advanced PTC heat technology for even efficient heating. Only takes about 30 seconds to heat up, the hair brush curler saves you time during your morning rush. The LCD digital display of thermal hair brush has multiple temperature settings from 180¬∞F up to 450¬∞F to meet all hair types' styling needs. This hot brush styler curling brush has a 60-minute auto shut-off for safety, a 360¬∞swivel cord for easy use and 100-240V dual voltage for travel convenience. With our KIPOZI thermal curling brush for healthy hair, leaving your hair looking healthy and shiny. Say goodbye to frizzy hair and hello to long-lasting curls!

We are committed to create some perfect and practical hair tools to our lovely beauties,leading you to a comfortable natural quality life. You will truly love yourself and be confidently beautiful! The thermal curling brush use advanced PTC heat technology for even efficient heating. Only takes about 30 seconds to heat up, the hair brush curler saves you time during your morning rush. The LCD digital display of thermal hair brush has multiple temperature settings from 180¬∞F up to 450¬∞F to meet all hair types' styling needs. This hot brush styler curling brush has a 60-minute auto shut-off for safety, a 360¬∞swivel cord for easy use and 100-240V dual voltage for travel convenience. With our KIPOZI thermal curling brush for healthy hair, leaving your hair looking healthy and shiny. Say goodbye to frizzy hair and hello to long-lasting curls! * üíïKey Featuresüíï
 * ‚ú®Speedy 30s Heating: 30-second heat-up because of PTC technology, avoid hair damage.
 * ‚ú®16 Adjustable Temperature: From 180¬∞F to 450¬∞F.180-350‚Ñâ for HEALTHY HAIR.350-400‚Ñâ for DAMAGED HAIR.400-450‚Ñâ for FRAGILE HAIR.
 * ‚ú®360¬∞ Swivel Cord: Easy to operate with 60¬∞ swivel cord.
 * ‚ú®Anti-Scald Tip: Anti-Scald Tip to protect your hand.
 * ‚ú®Auto Shut-off: 60-minute automatic shut-off for safety.
 * ‚ú®Dual Voltage: support dual voltage (100V-220V) for global compatibility.
 * üíïHow To Operateüíï
 * üçÑPlug in the power, press the switch button, the product boot, press"+"or"- "adjust to their desired temperature, wait for the temperature to arrive, you can use.
 * üçÑAfter you use it, press the on/off button to display off, then unplug the power supply and store it after cooling.
 * üíïSafety Precautionsüíï
 * üåµDo not use this product near water.
 * üåµDo not use it when your hands are wet.
 * üåµDo not repair, disassemble or modify this product by yourself. To avoid danger, It must be repaired/replaced by professionals in the manufacturer's maintenance department.
 * üåµWhen using the product, please don't put your hand into the heating pipe to touch it.
 * üåµWhen not in use, please store this product in a dry place.
 * üíïGentle Tipsüíï
 * üçÄTo avoid contact with skin, because the hair curler is still very hot after you switched it off in few seconds.
